head.title: To luve vnluvit it is ane pane

lg.l: To luve vnluvit it is ane pane
Ffor scho þat is my souerane
Sum wantoun ma[n] so he hes set hir
That I ca[n] get no lufe agane
Bot brekis my hairt & not the (bethi, struck through) bettir

lg.note: Quhe[n] þat I went wt þt sweit may
To dance to sing To sport and pley
and oft tymes in my armis plet hir
lg.l: I do now mvrne both nycht & day
and brekis my hart & not the bettir
Quhair I wes wont to se hir go
rycht trymly passand to and fro
with cumly smylis quhe[n] þat I met hir
and now I leif (b, struck through) in pane & wo
and brekis [etc]
Quhattane ane glaikit fule am I
To slay my self wt malancoly
Sen weill I ken I may not get hir
or quhat suld be the caus and quhy
To brek [etc]
My hairt sen thow may not hir pleiss
adew as gud lufe cu[m]is as gaiss
Go chuss ane vdir and forȝet hir
God gif him dolour and diseiss
That brekis thair hairt and not the bettir
Ffinis q Scott quhe[n] his wyfe left him
